artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Daikokuya Kichinosuke; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
dimension: 14 × 9 7/8 in. (35.56 × 25.08 cm) (image, sheet, each sheet; vertical ōban triptych)
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | Carver’s seal: 深彫長 {Fuka hori Chō} | Censor seal: 戌四改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
text: Actors Ichimura Uzaemon XIII (R), Sawamura Tanosuke III (C), and Kawarazaki Gonjūrō I (L).
title: Evening Shower among Flowers
